law.catch_line: An employee may not accumulate unused personal leave....

section.section: An employee may not accumulate unused personal leave.
Any unused personal leave shall be forfeited at the beginning of the first full pay period of the next calendar year.

text.section: Personal leave that is forfeited is placed, unless the employee objects, in the State Employees' Leave Bank established by § 9-602(a)(1) of this title.
